metadata.title: CVE-2017-12065 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
spikekill.php in Cacti before 1.1.16 might allow remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code via the avgnan, outlier-start, or outlier-endparameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12065` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.39+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.39+ds1-1').
